item.title: EP 999 - Do Demons Worship God?
item.itunes:title: Do Demons Worship God?
item.description:
Today we travel to Dominican University in San Rafael to meet a blue boy and his haunted bathtub, and then we visit Bled, Algeria to investigate a possessed bride. Is it possible that demons can follow a particular religion? And if that is true, can a Catholic priest exorcise a demon who believes Christ is king?

Is it possible that demons can follow a particular religion? And if that is true, can a Catholic priest exorcise a demon who believes Christ is king?
